M

main(String[]) - Static method in class application.Runner
The entry point of the application.
mainMenu() - Method in class application.Runner
Displays the main menu and handles user input to create and manage figures.
makeInvisible() - Method in class domain.Figure
Make the figure invisible, if it is already invisible nothing is done
makeVisible() - Method in class domain.Figure
Make the figure visible, if it is already visible nothing is done
manageFigure(Figure) - Method in class application.Runner
Displays the menu for managing a given figure and handles user input to perform actions on the figure.
moveDown() - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure down
moveHorizontal(int) - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure horizontal according to the 'distance'
moveLeft() - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure to the Left
moveRight() - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure to the right
moveUp() - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure up
moveVertical(int) - Method in class domain.Figure
Move the figure vertical according to the 'distance'
